TITLE: Nonce‑Protected Git Mirror for AI Memory (Read‑Only, URL-Shared) — Complete Guide

Nonce‑Protected Git Mirror for AI Memory (Read‑Only, URL-Shared)
— Complete Guide
Objective: Keep your MariaDB/Flask/Nginx memory system as the source of truth and
publish a **nonce‑protected** read‑only Git mirror (redacted JSON) that ChatGPT and
Claude can read **only if you share the exact URL**. No stable alias is published. Each
export lives under a rotating nonce path and filenames include the nonce. Security is
“reasonable, not military‑grade”: obscurity via nonce + redaction; full/private data stays in
MariaDB.
1) Access Model (Nonce‑Only)
• You share a fresh **RAW GitHub URL** that contains a random nonce string.
• Without that nonce, the mirror is difficult to guess or enumerate.
• The exporter rotates the nonce on a schedule (e.g., daily) or on demand.
• Old nonces are pruned from the repo to reduce exposure.
2) URLs to Share (Examples)
Replace ORG/REPO and <NONCE> with your values. You must paste the **exact**
URLs when you want an AI to fetch.
Search map (nonce path + nonce filename):
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HoffmanM361/memory-
mirror/main/catalog/<NONCE>/search_map_<NONCE>.json
Shard (by tag, inside the same nonce path):
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HoffmanM361/memory-
mirror/main/catalog/<NONCE>/shards/by_tag/memory.json
Chunk content (within the nonce chunk directory):
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HoffmanM361/memory-
mirror/main/chunks/<NONCE>/<chat_id>-<ix>.json

3) Repo Layout with Nonce
```
/catalog/
<NONCE>/
search_map_<NONCE>.json # entrypoint for this nonce

shards/
by_tag/memory.json # pretty-printed shard
by_tag/historic.json
by_date/2025-08.json
search_map_<NONCE>.json # duplicate at catalog root (optional)
/chunks/
<NONCE>/
<chat_id>-0.json
<chat_id>-1.json
/meta/
latest_build.json # timestamp + exported count
